url.description: URL used to download this dataset.

termsOfUse.description: URL to the terms of use that have been accepted to download this dataset

publishedIn.description: A key into the `references` dict. This is a reference to the paper that presents this dataset.

accessed.description: The CSL input model supports two different date representations: an EDTF string (preferred), and a more structured alternative.

available-date.description: The CSL input model supports two different date representations: an EDTF string (preferred), and a more structured alternative.

event-date.description: The CSL input model supports two different date representations: an EDTF string (preferred), and a more structured alternative.

original-date.description: The CSL input model supports two different date representations: an EDTF string (preferred), and a more structured alternative.

submitted.description: The CSL input model supports two different date representations: an EDTF string (preferred), and a more structured alternative.

event.description: [Deprecated - use 'event-title' instead. Will be removed in 1.1]

custom.description: Used to store additional information that does not have a designated CSL JSON field. The custom field is preferred over the note field for storing custom data, particularly for storing key-value pairs, as the note field is used for user annotations in annotated bibliography styles.
